comments.body: I think the user needs this if he exports the path, so maybe move this block to after the instructions on exporting paths.

You also need to ensure it's executable:

comments.body: It would also be useful to specify OS X and Linux examples, as in #11276.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@If you downloaded a pre-compiled release, kubectl should be under `platforms/<os>/<arch>`.

If you built from source, kubectl should be either under `_output/local/bin/<os>/<arch>` or `_output/dockerized/bin/<os>/<arch>`.

The kubectl binary doesn't have to be installed to be executable, but the rest of the walkthrough will assume that it's in your PATH.
